Name: Retro Flip Phone
Desc2:
A phone with a long list of failed outgoing calls to a contact named "Sis."
A pre-composed message remains unsent in the outbox:
"If anyone reads this and also finds a bag full of cash nearby, can you please send some of the money to a girl named Carol in Ward A2-1402, Eridu Hospital? Just tell her this is the aid she requested before."
